description: The template deploys 2 DB, 2 ASCS/SCS servers, 2 NFS machines and several (2-10) virtual machines that can host dialog instances.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys VM's customized for use with SAP NetWeaver and SAP HANA. The machine type and the number and size of the disks depend on the T-Shirt size (Demo/Small/Medium/Large) chosen in the template. The DB,ASCS/SCS and DI servers are placed in Availability Sets and a Load Balancer is added to the DB,ASCS/SCS server to allow HA configurations in the operating system.
